name: LSOA code
description: Code for the Lower Super Output Area in 2011 census

name: Area classification
description: LSOA area classification

name: Local Authority name
description: Local Authority name in 2017

name: Cars per person grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the number of cars per person

name: Kilometres driven per person
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the number of km driven per person

name: Travel to work by car grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the proportion of people who travel to work by car

name: Travel to work by bicycle grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the proportion of people who travel to work by bicycle

name: Travel to work by bus grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the proportion of people who travel to work by bus

name: Travel to work by train grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the proportion of people who travel to work by train

name: Travel to work by foot grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the proportion of people who travel to work by foot

name: Travel to work by underground/light rail grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the proportion of people who travel to work by London underground, tram, or other light rail

name: Electricity  emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the consumption of electricity

name: Gas emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the consumption of gas

name: Car emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the emissions from driving cars

name: Total emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the total carbon footprint

name: Flights emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the emissions from flying

name: Other heating emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the emission from non-gas non-electric heating

name: Van emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the driving of vans

name: Consumption emissions grade
description: Grade from A+ to F- for the consumption of good and services

name: Average EPC score
description: Average Energy Performance Certificate score for homes in 2020

name: Average floor area
description: Average floor area of homes with an EPC in 2020

name: Low energy lights
description: The percentage of lights with low energy lightbulbs
